EmailTemplate.name: 201802_Americas_Nurture_CDSR_Duncan_mih.201802_Americas_Email_CDSR_Nurture_1st E
EmailTemplate.subject: The Honeywell CDS/R Cockpit Upgrade for Falcon 900A/B
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]>
Add new life to your Primus Epic® cockpit and improve situational awareness with Honeywell’s control display system/retrofit (CDS/R) upgrade for Falcon 900A/B.
With CDS/R, you can control your newly added flight management system, graphical weather data, charts and maps, and more all on new Honeywell DU-1080 displays. Plus, CDS/R integrates seamlessly with existing equipment and sensors, making it more cost-effective and easy to install.
To show Honeywell’s commitment to supporting CDS/R, Falcon 900A/B operators who upgrade are eligible for one free year of HAPP after installation has been complete, and a $10,000 discount off years 2 and 3 of their 3-year or 5-year contract. As an added benefit, Honeywell is offering fixed year-over-year pricing on 5-year contracts.
Hurry, this offer expires Dec. 31, 2018. Contact Duncan Aviation to schedule your upgrade today.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_CDSR_Duncan.html]]>
